post.body: Hrmm...well I'd say nap unless you didn't get that cd yet..if anything we got a wings event at LD Tonight :).
I am soooo not ready for the rocking chair :), but did I forget to mention we are also great-grandparents to :) LMAO
*grins and returns the kiss* You are a great granddad.
Yes and I'm now a grandma on there. geeze. My lil world has grown
Dancing in his arms at Lexxistential Deviances and enjoying every moment of it.
Follows Sarah Conna.....the terminator be looking for you ;) lmao.....
Well my debut as a dj for second life happened saturday and apparently I did pretty good :).
It's been a long day though I woke up at about 2 p.m. i just worked on a new voice mail message and it's awesome :). silly but awesome :)
We have a family wedding to attend in California on the 19th. Erbo is Djing it :).
It's just been one of those lazy days. We've got a week and a half to go before we head out on a journey to California.
Very tired goth girl. after event got to get ready for Monday's event at Lexxistential Deviances. Disco!
I'm at the Goth event at Lexxistential Deviances now :). Dancing with my man, Erbo :).
Ok Ok. I'm awake. A bit whacked...but I'm awake. hehe just be warned...silly mood. :)
Fixing to go back to bed after waking Erbo up to get him to get ready for work.
Fixing to crash in bed with my man for the night :). Nini everyone :).
